category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 24-2 (Student Loan Account Management and Operation)
contents: Article 24-2 (Management and operation of student loan accounts) ① The Foundation manages and operates loan accounts in accordance with Article 24-2 of the Foundation Act and Article 5 (1) of the Special Act., ② Other matters related to the management and operation of loan accounts. shall be subject to enforcement ordinances of laws such as the Foundation Act, enforcement ordinances of laws such as the Special Act, and as determined by the Minister of Education. Revised 2019. 7. 11., 2020. 11. 5.
